availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Eulett (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Eulett and Drucilla Johnson Eulett. Married to Susan Lee Eulett in Lewis County, Kentucky, on July 3,1837. Father of Henry Jasper Eulett, Elizabeth Eulett, Susana Eulett, Newton Eulett, Jackson Eulett, Washington Eulett, William Eulett, Margaret Eulett, and Lewis Eulett. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 236A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 943.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Laurel Precinct, p. 480B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344051.
Lewis County Historical Society, _Pioneer Families of Lewis County, Kentucky, Indexed, (Mt. Vernon, IN: Windmill Publications, 1996), 56-57.
